body_html:
@JimSEOW Hi

I tried to build following the steps above.
I was able to build with Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=OFF
But, with Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON, I am getting the following error

"D:\temp\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"D:\temp\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\pywrap_tensorflow.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"D:\temp\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj" (default target) (33) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(171,5): error MSB6006: "cmd.exe" e
xited with code 1. [D:\temp\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]

362 Warning(s)
1 Error(s)

Any idea how to fix this

Thanks
